about.heading: I'm Shantanu Gonade, a Software Development Engineer with 3+ years of experience in Android application development.
about.description: Highly motivated and results-oriented Software Development Engineer with 3+ years of experience in Android application development, specializing in Kotlin and architecting scalable, high-performance mobile solutions. Proven ability to lead projects, improve user engagement, and optimize application performance. Previously worked at Samsung R&D Noida, India, now doing my masters in M.Eng. Software Engineering Professional from University of Maryland College Park.

projects.title: Scalable E-Commerce Platform on AWS
projects.description: Architected and deployed a robust e-commerce system utilizing AWS services such as EC2, RDS, CloudFront, and WAF. Implemented Auto Scaling and Load Balancer for dynamic traffic handling.

projects.title: Samsung Call Assistant
projects.description: Led the migration of Call Assistant and VoIP translator to Android 15 using MVI architecture. Reduced load time by 68%, increasing user engagement by 15%.

projects.title: Samsung MX Chat
projects.description: Developed core chat features (Calls, Social, Groups), achieving single modular dependency and improving response time by 12% and refresh rate by 34%.
